name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Golang Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, particularly in healthcare and finance. Expertise in **GoLang**, **AWS**, **microservices**, **NoSQL**, **SQL**, **Docker**, and **Jenkins**, with a proven track record of delivering scalable applications. Proficient in building cloud-native architectures leveraging **AWS CDK** and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, as well as message-driven systems using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **AWS SQS**. Skilled in **Python** and experienced in CI/CD automation, enhancing code deployment processes through effective use of **Git**. Strong problem-solving abilities and excellent communication skills help foster collaboration across teams and drive projects forward. Passionate about integrating innovative solutions that positively impact users, while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
